body:
Hello, I am the new main acc of SWAG23JorDan. That used to be until one day I decided to stop playing on almost every mc server on that account and start playing on this one. 
I am not new I have been here for 11 months but I thought since I have friends in this community that they should find out.

I have gotten a new skype so if you had my old one ask me in game.

The only reason Im saying Im back is because I haven't been playing avicus in the past like couple months so I thought I should add that to the title even if thats not the account I use anymore.

title: Hello Im back + AMA

replies.body:
Lol! You have been "gone" almost 20 days xD xD

Anyways, welcome back :)
